experience.title: Engineering
experience.description:
DLP Endpoints Optimization
-Developed the dlp-endpoints service from scratch using Go, transitioning performance-critical APIs that previously had ~1.8s latency to achieve sub-second responses, significantly improving client satisfaction and system throughput.

Interlink Intelligence (AI-driven Optimization)
-Enhanced DLP Platform with backend improvements including Interlink Optimization in Chat-DLP, enabling richer interlink structures and better data discoverability.
-Leveraged OpenAI embeddings to generate dynamic, multi-ratio interlinks across CLP, DLP, and PDP pages—improving search performance, contextual relevance, and merchandising flow.

Frontend Revamp & SEO Enhancement
-Led frontend overhaul with reusable FAQ and 404 templates, accelerating new client onboarding and improving SEO performance.
-Integrated Framer Motion animations for smooth UI transitions and scroll interactions, boosting user engagement and visibility in AI Overviews.

Platform Ownership & Engineering Support
-Owned and delivered DLP SLA targets, completing ~40 tickets in 2 months while concurrently managing Engineering Support for more than 2 months.
-Ensured high stability, rapid response to production issues, and consistent delivery across multiple feature teams.

Mentorship & Team Enablement
-Mentored and onboarded new interns through comprehensive KT sessions, daily support, and regular feedback cycles.
-Guided them through the complete feature development process

received_recommendations.recommender_title: Senior Software Engineer | React, TypeScript, Python, SQL) | 5+ YOE in Scalable Systems
received_recommendations.relationship: Indrajit worked with Malay on the same team
received_recommendations.recommendation_text:
I wholeheartedly recommend Malay Mishra for a front-end software engineering role. From June 2022 to April 2023, I witnessed Malay's exceptional growth and contributions to the Plivo team.
Malay is a technically proficient engineer with a deep understanding of modern web technologies. He played a critical role in transforming our Contacto product from an Electron.js desktop application to a highly responsive web app. This initiative improved real-time communication through websockets and BroadcastListeners and significantly enhanced our customer work speed by eliminating the need for platform switching.
In addition, his efforts to optimize our development process by transitioning from Create React App to Vite resulted in a 2x faster Hot Module Replacement (HMR) and a 4x improvement in build times. Malay's leadership skills were instrumental in developing key features such as email and WhatsApp channels and implementing Agent Monitoring and Barging features that attracted four new customers. This clearly demonstrated his ability to drive impactful changes.
Furthermore, Malay's commitment to quality is evident in his development of a UI component library and the integration of a logging mechanism using LogRocket.
Malay is an excellent communicator and a great team player. He is proactive in problem-solving and always eager to share knowledge and collaborate with his peers. His contributions have propelled our product development forward and fostered a collaborative and innovative team environment.
I am confident that Malay will continue to bring his unique talents, dedication, and innovative mindset to any future role he undertakes. He would be a valuable asset to any team.
Please do not hesitate to contact me if you need further information.

received_recommendations.relationship: Samuel was senior to Malay but didn't manage Malay directly
received_recommendations.recommendation_text: Malay is an excellent engineer a fast learner and a good team player. He can handle large features independently and can deliver on time. I've worked with him for a couple of years and he always solves problems and is a good UI developer. He has a good communication and interpersonal skills. Would highly recommend him for all your FE development needs.

given_recommendations.recommender_title: Senior Software Engineer | React, TypeScript, Python, SQL) | 5+ YOE in Scalable Systems
given_recommendations.relationship: Malay worked with Indrajit on the same team
given_recommendations.recommendation_text:
I had the pleasure of working alongside Indrajit at Plivo, where he consistently demonstrated exceptional skills in software development. His ability to architect and integrate complex features significantly enhanced our product offerings, notably leading to a 50% increase in user adoption and notably reducing customer churn by 15%.

Indrajit's expertise in React and TypeScript allowed him to develop critical components of our Omnichannel Cloud Contact Center, improving both team efficiency and product reliability. He was instrumental in building a comprehensive UI component library using Storybook and Material UI, which streamlined our development process and reduced QA efforts by 40%.

Moreover, his proactive approach in initiating and developing a Chat Widget web app as a Progressive Web App (PWA) was remarkable, boosting our lead conversion by 20% and contributing to a 15% revenue growth.

given_recommendations.relationship: Samuel was senior to Malay but didn't manage Malay directly
given_recommendations.recommendation_text: A guy with awesome knowledge in frontend and always eager to learn, from junior to senior, is the go-to person for any query and learning
